title: Diamond Floral Pendant - A Timeless Vaibhavam (Splendor)
features: Delicate floral motif pendant showcasing intricate pavé diamond setting. Features a scalloped edge design with five connected floral patterns. The openwork design allows light to pass through, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. The back is meticulously finished for comfort and durability. Perfectly paired with Addigai chain or pearl string.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship with Hyderabadi polish ensures a luxurious feel and long-lasting shine. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful gift. The diamond quality is carefully selected for maximum brilliance and sparkle. Modern design with a touch of traditional elegance, perfect for the contemporary woman.
